p.s: I disagree with you on the topic of student exchanges.
I don't think they are a waste of time, they just push you out of your comfort zone.
Here all some arguments that might convince you.
Firstly, student exchanges are a key in being successful in the work place for many jobs, since you have to communicate and deal with people from all around the world.
This gets easier if you have some experience in integrating into other cultures.
These experiences you can gain by taking part in student exchanges into another country.
If you have some prejudices of another culture, these exchanges can help you gain perspective and build your own opinion.
If you go into a student exchange it might help tearing down mistrust and hostility towards this culture, since you can see how the people truly are.
That's why I don't argue with you, on this topic and I hope I was able to convince you of my opinion.
